price: 134. Surely, that which you are promised will verily come to pass, and you cannot escape (from the punishment of Allâh).
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
